import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'../styles/ExternalTransfer.css';import'../styles/GlobalStyles.css';import MainLayout from'./MainLayout';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ExternalTransfer(){const[toRouting,setToRouting]=useState('');const[toAccount,setToAccount]=useState('');const[fromRouting,setFromRouting]=useState('');const[fromAccount,setFromAccount]=useState('');const[amount,setAmount]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(/^\d{1,16}$/.test(toRouting)&&/^\d{1,16}$/.test(toAccount)&&/^\d{1,16}$/.test(fromRouting)&&/^\d{1,16}$/.test(fromAccount)&&parseFloat(amount)>0){alert(`External transfer of $${amount} submitted.`);}else{alert("Please fill out all fields correctly.");}};const handleCancel=()=>{navigate(-1);// Go back to the previous page
